title: Demotion after two games?
body: So, I'm confused... I hit silver 4, but was immediately demoted after ONLY two losses at 0 lp. I don't understand.. shouldn't it be like, 3? I've had cases like this before without getting demoted, and I'm not asking for like a reroll on these games or anything, I'm just curious, how DOES the demotion system work? Is it based on your W/L ratio, or what, because I am very confused at how that happened.

replies.body: I looked into this for you and don't see any demotions after two losses.  Losing after your [ranked shield](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ) is gone can risk a demotion in your division, and in this case it looks like a streak resulted in that.  I do see you were promoted back since then, nice job!
Thank you! I didn't notice until recent but I looked back at it and saw that I had lost four or five.
